detaileddescription.para: This is the getting started guide.

sect1.title: How to run
sect1.para: To run the code using mpirun , use the following command :

listitem.para: process_number : The number of processes to run.
code_path : The path to your executable code.
input_file : The input file required for the code to run. (input file should be .json file)

sect1.para: Possble parsing option in command line

listitem.para: -I : File path to set the position of bath spins (See bathfiles)
-s : File path to set the spin state of bath spins (See statefile)
-a : File path to set principal axies of the defects in the bath (See avaaxfile)
-S : File path to set the spin state of on-site spins of the defects in the bath (See exstatefile)
\-N : The number of state configuration to do time ensemble average (See nstate)
\-B : Magnetic field in z direction (Unit : G) (See bfield)
